title: 2-Wheeler Scrapping
description: Scrap old bikes and scooters with a clear valuation process and guidance on required documents.

title: 4-Wheeler Scrapping (Cars)
description: Get scrap value for end-of-life cars with compliant handling and documentation support.

title: Heavy Vehicle Scrapping
description: Trucks and buses dismantling with safety-first operations. Pickup depends on distance.

title: Machinery / Plant Dismantling
description: End-to-end dismantling for industrial machinery and plant setups with responsible recycling.

title: Scrap Metal Trading (B2B)
description: Buy/sell industrial scrap metal. Share material type, quantity, and location for a quote.
